00029 class HstChanNoise : public HstBase {
00030 
00031 public:
00032   HstChanNoise(bool i=true) : HstBase(i) {
00033     for(unsigned i(0);i<22;i++) _slot[i]=false;
00034   }
00035 
00036   virtual ~HstChanNoise() {
00037   }
00038 
00039   void slotCanvas(unsigned slot) {
00040     std::cout << "slotCanvas called with slot " << slot << " Label = " << _label[slot] << std::endl;
00041 
00042     _slot[slot]=true;
00043 
00044     _canvas[slot]=new TCanvas(_label[slot].c_str(),_label[slot].c_str(),400+10*slot,10+10*slot,400,600);
00045     _canvas[slot]->Divide(1,2);
00046 
00047     //_graph[slot][0].Set(96);
00048     _graph[slot][0].SetTitle((_label[slot]+", Pedestal vs FE/Chip/Chan").c_str());
00049     //_graph[slot][0].SetMarkerColor(1);
00050     //_graph[slot][0].SetMarkerStyle(20);
00051       
00052     //_graph[slot][1].Set(96);
00053     _graph[slot][1].SetTitle((_label[slot]+", Noise vs FE/Chip/Chan").c_str());
00054     //_graph[slot][1].SetMarkerColor(1);
00055     //_graph[slot][1].SetMarkerStyle(20);
00056       
00057     for(unsigned fe(0);fe<8;fe++) {
00058       for(unsigned chip(0);chip<12;chip++) {
00059         for(unsigned chan(0);chan<18;chan++) {
00060           std::ostringstream sout;
00061           sout << _label[slot] << ", FE" << fe << ", Chip " << std::setw(2) << chip << ", Chan " << std::setw(2) << chan;
00062           
00063           _hist[slot][fe][chip][chan].SetNameTitle(sout.str().c_str(),sout.str().c_str());
00064           _hist[slot][fe][chip][chan].SetBins(100,-30000,30000);
00065         }
00066       }
00067     }
00068   }
00069 
00070   bool postscript(std::string) {
00071     for(unsigned i(0);i<22;i++) {
00072       if(_slot[i]) {
00073         std::ostringstream sout;
00074         sout << "dps/chanNoiseSER0" << _label[i][4] << _label[i][5] << ".ps";
00075         _canvas[i]->Print(sout.str().c_str());
00076       }
00077     }
00078     return false;
00079   }
00080 
00081   bool update() { //bool ps=false) {
00082     std::cout << "Updating..." << std::endl;
00083 
00084     for(unsigned slot(5);slot<22;slot++) {
00085       if(_slot[slot]) {
00086         _graph[slot][0].Set(0);
00087         _graph[slot][1].Set(0);
00088 
00089         for(unsigned i(0);i<8;i++) {
00090           for(unsigned chip(0);chip<12;chip++) {
00091             for(unsigned chan(0);chan<18;chan++) {
00092               unsigned bin(18*(12*i+chip)+chan);
00093               _graph[slot][0].AddPoint(bin,_average[slot][i][chip][chan].average(),0.0,_average[slot][i][chip][chan].errorOnAverage());
00094               _graph[slot][1].AddPoint(bin,_average[slot][i][chip][chan].sigma(),0.0,_average[slot][i][chip][chan].errorOnSigma());
00095 
00096               _hist[slot][i][chip][chan].Reset();
00097               _hist[slot][i][chip][chan].SetBins(100,unsigned(_average[slot][i][chip][chan].average())-50,unsigned(_average[slot][i][chip][chan].average())+50);
00098               
00099               _average[slot][i][chip][chan].reset();
00100             }
00101           }
00102         }
00103       }
00104     }
00105 
00106     for(unsigned i(0);i<22;i++) {
00107       if(_slot[i]) {
00108         _canvas[i]->Clear("D");
00109         _canvas[i]->cd(1);
00110         _graph[i][0].Draw("AP");
00111         _canvas[i]->cd(2);
00112         _graph[i][1].Draw("AP");
00113         _canvas[i]->Update();
00114       }
00115     }
00116     return true;
00117   }
00118 
00119   bool record(const RcdRecord &r) {
00120 
00121     if(r.recordType()==RcdHeader::runStart) {
00122 
00123       SubAccessor extracter(r);
00124       std::vector<const CrcLocationData<CrcVmeRunData>* > v(extracter.extract< CrcLocationData<CrcVmeRunData> >());
00125 
00126       for(unsigned i(0);i<v.size();i++) {
00127         if(!_slot[v[i]->slotNumber()]) {
00128           std::ostringstream sout;
00129           unsigned sn((v[i]->data()->epromHeader())&0xff);
00130           if(sn<10) sout << "SER00" << sn << ", Slot " << std::setw(2) << (unsigned)v[i]->slotNumber();
00131           else      sout << "SER0"  << sn << ", Slot " << std::setw(2) << (unsigned)v[i]->slotNumber();
00132           _label[v[i]->slotNumber()]=sout.str();
00133           slotCanvas(v[i]->slotNumber());
00134         }
00135       }
00136       return true;
00137     }
00138 
00139     if(r.recordType()!=RcdHeader::event) return true;
00140     
00141     SubAccessor extracter(r);
00142     std::vector<const CrcLocationData<CrcVlinkEventData>* > v(extracter.extract< CrcLocationData<CrcVlinkEventData> >());
00143 
00144     for(unsigned i(0);i<v.size();i++) {
00145       if(_slot[v[i]->slotNumber()]) {
00146         for(unsigned fe(0);fe<8;fe++) {
00147           const CrcVlinkFeData *fd(v[i]->data()->feData(fe));
00148           if(fd!=0) {
00149             for(unsigned chan(0);chan<v[i]->data()->feNumberOfAdcSamples(fe) && chan<18;chan++) {
00150               const CrcVlinkAdcSample *as(fd->adcSample(chan));
00151               if(as!=0) {
00152                 for(unsigned chip(0);chip<12;chip++) {
00153                   _average[v[i]->slotNumber()][fe][chip][chan]+=as->adc(chip);
00154                   _hist[v[i]->slotNumber()][fe][chip][chan].Fill(as->adc(chip));
00155                 }
00156               }
00157             }
00158           }
00159         }
00160       }
00161     }
00162     return true;
00163   }
00164 
00165 private:
00166   TCanvas *_canvas[22];
00167 
00168   //TGraphErrors _graph[22][2];
00169   HstTGraphErrors _graph[22][2];
00170   TH1D _hist[22][8][12][18];
00171 
00172   bool _slot[22];
00173   std::string _label[22];
00174   UtlAverage _average[22][8][12][18];
00175 };
